resetVariable
                        /pause 500
                    /textAboveHead TravisV "Hm hm hm~"
                        /pause 1500
                    /quickQuestion # What are you whipping up? # What's cookin' good lookin'? <
                        (break)pause 300
                            \speak TravisV "Blackberry Cobbler! I'm a sucker for this stuff.$13"
                        (break)pause 300
                            \emote TravisV 40
                            \speak TravisV "Heh. Seems like somebody's got a sweet tooth.$9#$b#It's blackberry cobbler if you'd like to know.$8"
                            \action IncrementStat LitD.TravisFlirt 1
                    /speak TravisV "I go pickin' berries every fall and bake with 'em year round.$h#$b#Good for the environment too. Most blackberries are actually invasive around these parts.$6"

                        /advancedMove farmer false -1 0 1 10

                        /pause 500

                    /speak TravisV "I've got a pretty peculiar companion.$6#$b#Let me show him to ya while this bakes."

                    /speak TravisV "Hm hm hm. I know he's around here somewhere...$6"

                        /pause 100
                        /showframe TravisV 31
                    /textAboveHead TravisV "Jeremy!"

                        /pause 700

                        /faceDirection farmer 1
                        /advancedMove TravisV false 2 0 1 10
                    /speak TravisV "Aye, there's my big buddy.$l#$b#Don't mind him, he just moves at a...$9#$b#...snail's pace.$24" 
                        /quickQuestion # That's not even a pun, that's just literal. # Absolutely snail-arious. # Are we going to ignore the elephant in the room?
                        (break)emote TravisV 56
                            \speak TravisV "Oh don't be so uptight, farmer.$9#$b#Have ya ever thought about coming outta your shell a little?$24"
                            \emote farmer 40 true
                        (break)emote TravisV 224
                            \speak TravisV "Aye! You've s-nailed it with that one!$8"
                            \emote farmer 224 true
                        (break)emote farmer 228 true
                            \startJittering\jump farmer\showFrame farmer 94\pause 1800\stopJittering\faceDirection farmer 1\speak TravisV "Eh? I don't see any elephants, farmer.$24#$b#I think you need to get your eyes checked. Perhaps you should shell out for a good pair of glasses?$8"\emote farmer 240 true
                        /advancedMove farmer false 2 0 2 10
                        /waitForAllStationary
                    /speak TravisV "So, yeah. This is Jeremy. Say hi Jeremy.$l"
                        /playSound LitD_SFX.SnailCry
                        /emote JeremyTSnail 56 true
                        /animate JeremyTSnail true false 150 16 17 18 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 18 17 16
                        /pause 1950
                        /stopAnimation JeremyTSnail 12
                    /speak TravisV "I went traveling for a while after I uh...$6#$b#...moved on from my previous career.$18"
                        /faceDirection TravisV 2
                        /pause 200
                        /showframe TravisV 34
                        /pause 1300
                        /faceDirection TravisV 2
                    /speak TravisV "Found myself on Ginger Island and he and a few of his baby snail buddies stowed away in my backpack$u.#$b#His species isn't native to these parts, kinda eat everything, and never stop growing.$6"
                        /showframe TravisV 32
                        /emote TravisV 28
                        /pause 100
                    /speak TravisV "If you see any of 'em around, could you bring 'em to Jer?$12#$b#He knows how to keep 'em under control.$13"
                        /faceDirection TravisV 1
                        /emote farmer 32
                        /pause 200
                    /speak TravisV "Otherwise, Jeremy's a great companion.$h#$b#Don't judge him based on his looks. He might not have a brain, but he's way smarter than he seems.$l"
                        /playSound LitD_SFX.SnailCry
                        /emote JeremyTSnail 244 true
                        /jump JeremyTSnail
                        /pause 800
                    /speak TravisV "He even knows how to play cards! Lemmie show you.$13"
                        /playSound LitD_SFX.SnailCry

                        /animate JeremyTSnail true true 150 16 17 18 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 18 17 16
                        /pause 1950
                        /stopAnimation JeremyTSnail 12

                        /pause 200
                        /emote farmer 32 true
                    
                        /globalFade 0.012

                    /message "You play cards with Jeremy and Travis for a while... Somehow, Jeremy wins every time."

                        /animate JeremyTSnail true true 150 16 17 18 19 19 18 17 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16
                        /viewport 7 19

                    /speak TravisV "Aaaand done! Hope ya like blackberry, farmer.$l"
                        /faceDirection TravisV 3
                        /emote TravisV 232
                        /pause 100
                        /faceDirection farmer 2
                        /pause 200
                        /farmerEat 611
                        /pause 2700
                        /playSound yoba
                        /emote farmer 20
                    /speak TravisV "%The cobbler tastes divine, perfectly warm and homely.#$b#%Somehow it reminds you of %favorite..."
                        /pause 200
                        /faceDirection farmer 1
                        /pause 100
                        /animate TravisV false true 175 30 31
                    /speak TravisV "No need to tell me how it is. I already know it's perfect.$9#$b#It's a family secret recipe... My ma's creations are always showstoppers.$11"
                        /stopAnimation TravisV 0
                        /pause 300
                        /faceDirection TravisV 3
                    /speak TravisV "Thanks for dropping in... it's been nice.$11#$b#That said, I think I needa recharge my battery.$20#$b#Hope you stop in again sometime.$11"
                    /quickQuestion # Catch you later! # Keep that smile warm for me, I'll be coming back for it. <
                        (break)emote TravisV 32 true
                            \pause 1000
                            \emote farmer 56 true
                            \pause 400
